website_summaries.verdict: A good traditional option for mid-century design if you don't want to push the boundaries of the style. Lots of organization and surface space.
pros: Great built-in organization features including two open shelves and a central drawer for small items
cons: Heavy-duty construction makes the table heavy and complicated to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Don't try to assemble if you've been drinking, otherwise it's not too bad to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Top Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.  Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table falls apart at random. The end falls off when lightly bumped, and sometimes for no reason at all. The drawers stick and don’t open fully and don’t always close fully. You shouldn’t have to glue your table together every month in order to make it look functional.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Rathje

customer_reviews.title: I like the whole Belham mid-century living room set
customer_reviews.text: Has a funky smell for a few days, but that wasn't a big deal for me. I like the whole Belham mid-century living room set. The instructions were easy to read and the delivery was quick too! I did struggle for about an hour trying to put the drawers in, because they were not fitting properly, but that was my fault for not assembling it correctly at first. I wish it was already assembled like the other Belham furniture pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is 90% particleboard. Very cheaply made. My first table came with a huge chunk of wood broken. The second had a divit in the top because of the cheap partial board it is made of. You will also have to de-gas it for a day, because it smells from the varnish. I ended up throwing the drawers away because they were so poorly made and did not go into the sliders at all. I will say the consumer service was good and that deserved the extra star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lovely, affordable, light, and functional piece
customer_reviews.text: This table looks just as depicted. Assembly is easy for two and totally doable alone -- lining up the top in the final step requires a little care and balance. The middle section features a drawer on each side and the openings pass through and are accessible from both sides -- features that are wonderful, but not obvious from the pictures. The result is sturdy but light so its easy to reposition and I expect it to last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrit H. Dalman

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: instructions are easy to follow. Takes about an hour. Table looks great. All pieces were in good condition when it arrived but One of the wooden dowels was too long and cracked the top piece when assembled. And a hole for one of the screws was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and didn't break the bank!  Win, Win!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been looking for years for something mid century period correct for our living room to replace some older tables but was having a hard time finding anything that was decent quality for a good price and that was also the height suitable for our couch.....needless to say, this hit the nail on the head! It also showed up much faster than expected, 2-3 days vs the week and half projected. We got the side table and the bookshelf in this collection as well. We haven't set up the bookshelf yet, but assume we'll be just as happy. Aesthetically pleasing and didn't break the bank! Win, Win!!
customer_reviews.author: peachpebbles

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than it's completion, but well worth the money. Feels like real wood furniture with stained/smooth finish. Storage drawers don't bind and make for easy access to clutter items like tv remotes, gaming system remotes, and books/magazines.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: 2 years old...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style, wood tone and storage. But, at 2 years old, the veneer is starting to peel in spots. No kids, single person household, so not subject to rough use. Endlessly searching for replacement of solid wood versus veneer. I purchased the matching end table also, so hope to find a replacement for that too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this a great piece of furniture and exactly what I was looking for. There was a small scratch that I've disguised, but I guarantee I didn't put it there, so I'm still giving this five stars. It's a beautiful finish and sturdy enough to sit on, although I only do that if I'm walking past a nail-biting scene on my TV and don't have the time to make it to the sofa. A+, Belham.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and design.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, assembled it in within 30 minutes, you can see the screws in the middle section but it’s nicely designed, great communication with vendor also, worked out a great solution for a minor issue I had, thank you! Great price for a table, it was very difficult for me to find a rectangular rounded coffee table because I have kids and didn’t want the sharp corners, this table was ideal. Great price too compared to others I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia G.

customer_reviews.title: Drawers are the worst!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was super fast! I was estimated to receive the table between September 4-9, but it arrived August 31st. The top of the table has a few indents on the top and wasn’t secured at one of the seems, which was disappointing because I paid good money for the table, but don’t want to go through the hassle of sending it back. After 3 hours, I’m still trying to figure out how to put the drawers in. The instructions are not helpful because it literally shows a drawer being pushed into the table.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for a coffee table.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bigger than I expected but that's not a bad thing. Nice drawer space and storage.A little trouble putting together is the reason for 4 stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: Ms Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to put together, however, the table is beautiful and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to put together, however, the table is beautiful and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerhard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I love the shape. The wood does seem to be a bit lighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kegley

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to assemble, sturdy so far. Only drawback/recommendation is to seal the table with wax or have coasters because water marks appear relatively easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Krause

customer_reviews.title: I’d purchase it again.
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing. We’re thrilled with the sturdiness and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and sturdy. Just plan on using an Allen wrench for an hour to put all the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dice

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, so-so quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but the hardware is of low quality. It's already coming apart, so I bought some new locking screw sets from Home Depot. Assembly was straight forward, but my fingers are sore from tons of Allen wrenching.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T.

product_meta.title: Belham Living Carter Mid Century Modern Coffee Table
product_meta.description: Belham Living Carter Mid Century Modern Coffee Table
feature_bullets: Solid poplar legs with birch veneer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars27 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
